subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
subSections.text: Originally a compound of {{com|ja|sort=きのこ|木|の|子|tr1=ki|t1=[[tree]]|tr2=no|pos2=attributive or possessive particle|tr3=ko|t3=[[child]]}}.<ref>{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref>{{R:Daijisen}}</ref><ref>{{R:Kojien}}</ref><ref name="DJR"/>

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|たけ|yomi=k}}

{{rfe|ja|sort=|Cognate with {{m|ja|丈|tr=take}}, whereas {{m|ja|高い|tr=takai}} and/or {{m|ja|長ける|tr=takeru}}?}}

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
See also
Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|くさびら}}

Extension of {{m|ja|草片|tr=kusabira||[[edible]] [[plant]] or [[green#Noun|green]]}}.

subSections.title: Noun
See also
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|斎宮の忌み詞|^さいぐう の いみことば}}
